alert.note: Alert for Western Highland (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued December 24 at 12:59PM EST until December 25 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 25 below zero. * WHERE...In Virginia, Western Highland County. In West Virginia, Western Grant and Western Pendleton Counties. * WHEN...Until noon EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
